text: agar ye log tumamen (milakar) nikalate bhee to bas tumame fasaad hee barapa kar dete aur tumhaare haq mein fitana karaane kee garaz se tumhaare daramiyaan (idhar udhar) ghode daudaate phirate aur tumamen se unake jaasoos bhee hain (jo tumhaaree unase baaten bayaan karate hain) aur khuda shareeron se khoob vaaqif hai
